title: I like beef

title: Punchy McPunch-a-lot
description: Mantis shrimp can punch out prey much larger than itself, and they can create cavitation bubbles that stun or kill small prey.

title: Don't bring a boxing glove to a shoot-out!
description: Pistol shrimp win over mantis shrimp any day. They generate a loud bang sound with their punches as loud as 220 decibels and generate temperatures as high as 4700* C!

title: SOOOO CUTE, right?!
description: There are one species and 9 subspecies of giraffe according to the International Union for Conservation of Nature.
